attributes.description:
Please visit www.cbkmotors.co.za for a virtual tour of this car as well as our online showroom. You can also click the Finance Option to do a remote finance application and get pre-approved on the vehicle of your choice. Its a Toyota, what more do we have to say? This is a great family car. This vehicle is clean and mechanically sound with a full service history. If you want something that has space and will last you a lifetime then she is definitely the one for you. Great Value for money with features that include; electric windows, alloy mags, air-con, ABS, Air bags, central locking and more! We take things a little more seriously at CBK Motors we do a full ABC Assessment on all vehicles. A: Body for dents, scratches and scuff marks. attributes.description: The CX5 is the bestselling car in the Mazda range and the Dynamic Auto is the middle of the range in the 2.0 litre engine. The CX5 Dynamic Auto offers a very good value proposition and spec level, which includes a Full leather interior, electric drivers seat, smart advanced keyless access, auto fold mirrors, auto lights and wipers, Apple Car Play/Android Auto and Bluetooth, reverse camera, 17 wheel and tyre combo, driveway lock, cruise control and dual zone climate control which blows through to the rear. The CX5 comes with a 3 year unlimited mileage service plan and warranty, with the option of extending and roadside assistance for 3 years.
